UpdateQueue.html.title: UpdateQueue
UpdateQueue.html.name: UpdateQueue
UpdateQueue.html.description: Helper class to manage database updates that occur from hooks that may fire back to back.

UpdateQueue.html#queue.title: queue
UpdateQueue.html#queue.name: queue
UpdateQueue.html#queue.description: buffer of update functions to run

WildMagicSurge.html.title: WildMagicSurge
WildMagicSurge.html.name: WildMagicSurge
WildMagicSurge.html.description: Implements stock surge rules, and two homebrew variants. "More Surges" will surge if the d20 is less than or equal to the spell level cast. "Volatile Surges" will add a d4 to the spell level if the sorcerer has their Tides feature expended.

ActionDialog.html.title: ActionDialog
ActionDialog.html.name: ActionDialog
ActionDialog.html.description: Simple form app that allows you to list abilities for a combatant options = { action, bonus, reaction, legendary, lair, special }

ActionManagement.html.title: ActionManagement
ActionManagement.html.name: ActionManagement
ActionManagement.html.description: ActionManagement This Module strictly manages token action economy per the dnd5e rules.

WildMagicAPI.html.title: WildMagicAPI
WildMagicAPI.html.name: WildMagicAPI
WildMagicAPI.html.description: Acts as the primary API class for the wild magic system and interacting with it. Exposes system functions from the DnDWildMagic class.

WildMagicAPI.html#registerHandler.title: registerHandler( label, handler [, preCheck ] )  {boolean}
WildMagicAPI.html#registerHandler.name: registerHandler
WildMagicAPI.html#registerHandler.description: Registers the provided handler with the wild magic system. If done during the 'wmsRegister' hook, will additionally add this to the actor special traits list. If done afterwords, can be invoked by directly calling 'surge'.

WildMagicAPI.html#unregisterHandler.title: unregisterHandler( label )  {boolean}
WildMagicAPI.html#unregisterHandler.name: unregisterHandler
WildMagicAPI.html#unregisterHandler.description: Unregisters a given handler and preCheck pair based on the handler's key (label)

WildMagicAPI.html#surge.title: surge( actor [, surgeOptions ] )  {Promise}
WildMagicAPI.html#surge.name: surge
WildMagicAPI.html#surge.description: Force a surge to occur for the desired actor

WildMagicAPI.html#generateChatData.title: generateChatData( )  {Object}
WildMagicAPI.html#generateChatData.name: generateChatData
WildMagicAPI.html#generateChatData.description: Helper function for creating the chat message data for a given surge result

WildMagicAPI.html#isTidesCharged.title: isTidesCharged( actor )  {boolean}
WildMagicAPI.html#isTidesCharged.name: isTidesCharged
WildMagicAPI.html#isTidesCharged.description: Determines if the actor has a charged use of Tides remaining. In the event of both a resource and feature item being used to track charges, this will indicate true (charged) if either the resource or item has uses left.

WildMagicAPI.html#tidesRechargeUpdate.title: tidesRechargeUpdate( actor )  {Object}
WildMagicAPI.html#tidesRechargeUpdate.name: tidesRechargeUpdate
WildMagicAPI.html#tidesRechargeUpdate.description: Generates the needed actor and item updates for recharging the configured Tides feature/resource

HelpersSettingsConfig.html.title: HelpersSettingsConfig
HelpersSettingsConfig.html.name: HelpersSettingsConfig
HelpersSettingsConfig.html.description: HelpersSettingConfig extends {SettingsConfig} Additional window for 5e Helper specific settings Allows for Settings to be organized in 4 categories System Helpers NPC Features PC Features Combat Helpers

LairActionManagement.html.title: LairActionManagement
LairActionManagement.html.name: LairActionManagement
LairActionManagement.html.description: LegendaryActionManagement This Module strictly manages Legendary action economy per the dnd5e rules.

LairActionManagement.html#._createCombat.title: <static> _createCombatant( combatant )
LairActionManagement.html#._createCombat.name: _createCombatant
LairActionManagement.html#._createCombat.description: Check Combatant for Lair Actions, store information on the combat. actorid, [itemid],

LegendaryActionManagement.html.title: LegendaryActionManagement
LegendaryActionManagement.html.name: LegendaryActionManagement
LegendaryActionManagement.html.description: LegendaryActionManagement This Module strictly manages Legendary action economy per the dnd5e rules.

LegendaryActionManagement.html#._createC.title: <static> _createCombatant( combatant )
LegendaryActionManagement.html#._createC.name: _createCombatant
LegendaryActionManagement.html#._createC.description: Check Combatant for Legendary Actions, store information on the combat. actorid, [itemid],

DnDWildMagic.html.title: DnDWildMagic
DnDWildMagic.html.name: DnDWildMagic
DnDWildMagic.html.description: Core wild magic operations, initialization, and helper functions

DnDWildMagic.html#.slotExpended.title: <static> slotExpended( actor, update )  {boolean|Object}
DnDWildMagic.html#.slotExpended.name: slotExpended
DnDWildMagic.html#.slotExpended.description: Standard surge "pre-check" function which determines if this particular actor update represents the use of a spell slot. This is the default pre-check handler used if one is not supplied by the caller of DnDWildMagic.registerHandler

WildMagicAPI.templates.html#.handler.title: <async, static> handler( actor, surgeData, targetRoll, surgeRoll )  {Promise}
WildMagicAPI.templates.html#.handler.name: handler
WildMagicAPI.templates.html#.handler.description: Core roll <= target handler. Has no side effects and can be used to build upon. Checks for surge given the roll and targets, produces chat message data, retrieves the table configured in Helpers, and produces the update data for recharging Tides if enabled in the Helpers options.

WildMagicAPI.templates.html#.preCheck.title: <static> preCheck( actor, updates )  {Object|boolean}
WildMagicAPI.templates.html#.preCheck.name: preCheck
WildMagicAPI.templates.html#.preCheck.description: Core "was slot used?" pre check for surging. Checks if the actor update is a reduction in spell slot counts. Each preCheck function will return data for its paired handler to consume in order to execute the needed rolls to determine if a surge actually occurs.
